Apttus_Config2__TotalQuantity__c.HelpText: The total quantity is Quantity + Asset Quantity

Apttus_Config2__Taxable__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line item is taxable

Apttus_Config2__TaxInclusive__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the price is tax inclusive. Only applicable for taxable items.

Apttus_Config2__TaxCodeId__c.Label: Tax Code
Apttus_Config2__TaxCodeId__c.HelpText: ID of the tax code associated with the line item. Only applicable for taxable items.

Apttus_Config2__StatusDetails__c.HelpText: Maintains information about what is pending

Apttus_Config2__ShipToAccountId__c.HelpText: ID of the ship to account

Apttus_Config2__ServiceLocationId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated service location

Apttus_Config2__RollupPriceMethod__c.Label: Rollup Price Method
Apttus_Config2__RollupPriceMethod__c.HelpText: The rollup price method.Only applicable to Option line types.

Apttus_Config2__PricingGuidance__c.Label: Pricing Guidance
Apttus_Config2__PricingGuidance__c.HelpText: The pricing guidance associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__PriceGroup__c.Label: Price Group
Apttus_Config2__PriceGroup__c.HelpText: The price group associated with the product or option

Apttus_Config2__PaymentTermId__c.Label: Payment Term
Apttus_Config2__PaymentTermId__c.HelpText: ID of the payment term associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__ParentBundleNumber__c.Label: Parent Bundle Number
Apttus_Config2__ParentBundleNumber__c.HelpText: Represents the parent bundle number associated with the child bundle

Apttus_Config2__OptionPrice__c.Label: Option Price
Apttus_Config2__OptionPrice__c.HelpText: The rolled up adjusted price of options for each unit of the bundle product

Apttus_Config2__NetUnitPrice__c.Label: CLP
Apttus_Config2__NetUnitPrice__c.HelpText: The net unit price for the product or service is the Unit Adjusted Price after applying the Group Adjustment %

Apttus_Config2__MaxUsageQuantity__c.Label: Max Usage Quantity
Apttus_Config2__MaxUsageQuantity__c.HelpText: The maximum usage quantity. Only applicable to usage items.

Apttus_Config2__LineSequence__c.Label: Line Sequence
Apttus_Config2__LineSequence__c.HelpText: Sequence a logical line using this sequence.

Apttus_Config2__IsUsageTierModifiable__c.Label: Is Usage Tier Modifiable
Apttus_Config2__IsUsageTierModifiable__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the usage price tier is modifiable for the product or option

Apttus_Config2__IsSellingTermReadOnly__c.Label: Is Selling Term Read Only
Apttus_Config2__IsSellingTermReadOnly__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the selling term is modifiable for the recurring product or option

Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryRampLine__c.Label: Is Primary Ramp Line
Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryRampLine__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line is the primary line for the price ramp. Only applicable when price ramp is in effect for the product or option

Apttus_Config2__IsOptional__c.Label: Is Optional
Apttus_Config2__IsOptional__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line item is optional

Apttus_Config2__IsAssetPricing__c.Label: Is Asset Pricing
Apttus_Config2__IsAssetPricing__c.HelpText: Indicates whether asset pricing is in effect for the line item

Apttus_Config2__IncentiveExtendedPrice__.Label: Incentive Extended Price
Apttus_Config2__IncentiveExtendedPrice__.HelpText: The incentive extended price is Quantity X Incentive Base Price X Term (if applicable) for individual products and options

Apttus_Config2__IncentiveCode__c.Label: Incentive Code
Apttus_Config2__IncentiveCode__c.HelpText: The incentive code available to customers to identify the incentive

Apttus_Config2__IncentiveBasePrice__c.Label: Incentive Base Price
Apttus_Config2__IncentiveBasePrice__c.HelpText: The incentive base price is Base price + Incentive Adjustments for individual products and options

Apttus_Config2__HideInvoiceDisplay__c.Label: Hide Invoice Display
Apttus_Config2__HideInvoiceDisplay__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the item would be hidden in the invoice display.

Apttus_Config2__HideCopyAction__c.Label: Hide Copy Action
Apttus_Config2__HideCopyAction__c.HelpText: Check to hide copy action for the line item

Apttus_Config2__HasTieredPrice__c.Label: Has Tiered Price
Apttus_Config2__HasTieredPrice__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line item has a tiered price.

Apttus_Config2__HasIncentives__c.Label: Has Incentives
Apttus_Config2__HasIncentives__c.HelpText: Indicates whether there are one or more incentives associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__Guidance__c.Label: Guidance
Apttus_Config2__Guidance__c.HelpText: The pricing guidance associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__FlatOptionPrice__c.Label: Flat Option Price
Apttus_Config2__FlatOptionPrice__c.HelpText: The rolled up adjusted flat price of options for the bundle product

Apttus_Config2__ExtendedQuantity__c.Label: Extended Quantity
Apttus_Config2__ExtendedQuantity__c.HelpText: The extended quantity is Quantity X Parent Quantity)

Apttus_Config2__DeltaQuantity__c.Label: Delta Quantity
Apttus_Config2__DeltaQuantity__c.HelpText: The change in quantity for the asset due to the latest order. It is positive for increments, negative for decrements and zero when there is no change.

Apttus_Config2__DeltaPrice__c.Label: Delta Price
Apttus_Config2__DeltaPrice__c.HelpText: The change to the net price of the asset due to the latest order. It is positive for increments, negative for decrements and zero when there is no change.

Apttus_Config2__CopySourceNumber__c.HelpText: The Primary Line Number of the line item the current line was copied from

Apttus_Config2__CollaborationParentLineN.Label: Collaboration Parent Line Number
Apttus_Config2__CollaborationParentLineN.HelpText: Line number of the collaborated line item from parent configuration

Apttus_Config2__ChargeGroupId__c.Label: Charge Group
Apttus_Config2__ChargeGroupId__c.HelpText: ID of the charge group to which this charge type is associated

Apttus_Config2__BillingRule__c.Label: Billing Rule
Apttus_Config2__BillingRule__c.HelpText: The billing rule associated with the price item

Apttus_Config2__BillingPreferenceId__c.Label: Billing Preference
Apttus_Config2__BillingPreferenceId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated billing preference

Apttus_Config2__BillingFrequency__c.Label: Billing Frequency
Apttus_Config2__BillingFrequency__c.HelpText: The billing frequency associated with the recurring or usage price

Apttus_Config2__BillToAccountId__c.Label: Bill To
Apttus_Config2__BillToAccountId__c.HelpText: ID of the bill to account

Apttus_Config2__AssetId__c.HelpText: ID of the asset associated with the line item

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.nbr_G_fast_p.Label: nbr G.fast ports with 17a fall back

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.VDSL2_17a_pr.Label: VDSL2 17a profile fall back for G.fast
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.VDSL2_17a_pr.HelpText: vectored VDSL2 17a fall-back capability allows to deploy VDSL2 service per port basis on those subscribers where VDSL2 service maybe required, for example when existing CPE needs to be migrated to G.Fast or where G.fast service cannot be qualified.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.How_many_400.Label: How many 400Gbps Interfaces do you need?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.NTIO_Require.Label: NTIO Required
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.NTIO_Require.HelpText:
NTIO card is mandatory if:-AC power supply required-Voice subscribers required-More than 3 VDSL cards equipped-More than 3 G.fast cards equipped
If none of these conditions is required,select the NTIO card to extend with more uplinks or downlinks

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Powering_DF_.Label: Powering
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Powering_DF_.HelpText:
7362DF 8G supports two powering options: 
– AC power: 85 V to 280 V AC, 47 Hz to 63 Hz  
– DC power: 36 V DC to -72 V DC using redundant DC power inputs

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.No_of_Years_.Label: # of Years for SRS
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.No_of_Years_.HelpText: Same as number of years of maintenance

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Alarm_Cable_.Label: Alarm Cable required
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Alarm_Cable_.HelpText: The gland plug is required in case an external alarm cable is to be connected to the unit. It ensures the unit remains completely sealed. The Alarm Cable is sourced by the provider.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Virtual_Chas.Label: Virtual Chassis functionality required?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Virtual_Chas.HelpText: *Future functionality* Select this option if you plan to use this product in a FUTURE Virtual Chassis installation.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.PoE_function.Label: PoE functionality required?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.PoE_function.HelpText: If you need some PoE ports, select this option.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Please_selec.Label: Number of access ports required?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Please_selec.HelpText: Select a range which meets your requirements.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Please_selec.Label: Please select a power type?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Please_selec.HelpText: What power environment are you working in? Selecting "Flexible" will list products which support AC and DC power simultaneously.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Fully_or_par.Label: Full or Partial NEBs Compliance?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Fully_or_par.HelpText: Not all products are fully NEBs compliant - please select the level of compliance required.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.External_Red.Label: External Redundant PowerSupply required?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.External_Red.HelpText: *Future functionality* Select this option if you plan to use this product with an external Redundant Power Supply in future.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Access_Port_.Label: Access Port Type?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Access_Port_.HelpText: Select the type of access port you need for your implementation.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.How_many_SMF.Label: How many SMF 10Gbps ports are required?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.How_many_MMF.Label: How many MMF 10Gbps ports are required?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.How_many_40G.Label: How many 40Gbps Interfaces do you need?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.How_many_100.Label: How many 100Gbps Interfaces do you need?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Which_releas.Label: Which release of SPS are you offering?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Which_IMPACT.Label: Which IMPACT release is being offered?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Total_number.Label: Total number of subscribers in network?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Total_Number.Label: Total Number of vCPUs with Java Policy
Total Number of vCPUs with Java Charging
Total Number of vCPUs with Java CE

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_sp.Label: Number of spare MRV Terminal Server
Number of spare HP RMS servers

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_se.Label: Number of servers with Single CPU
Number of servers with Dual CPU

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_de.Label: Number of devices to be supported?
Number of devices to be managed?
Number of devices for Carrier Space?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_MS.Label: Number of MSISDN using SS7 Mediation

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Months_of_te.Label: Months of tech. headcount support - CDE

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.How_is_the_s.Label: How is the software to be delivered

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.How_is_the_P.Label: How is the licence pricing done?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.How_is_the_L.Label: How is the Licence to be delivered

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Will_FP4_Lin.Label: Will FP4 Line Card be required?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Wall_Mountin.Label: Wall Mounting Kit
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Wall_Mountin.HelpText: Select this option if the mechanical kit to install the 7367 SX-48U in a wall or similar surface is requested.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Voice_requir.Label: Voice required
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Voice_requir.HelpText: Voice lines are always included in the equipment. Check this option if POTS are going to be used in order to activate the SW licenses.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Variants__c.Label: Variants
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Variants__c.HelpText: Two variants available : one with MELT Metallic Line Testing  and no POTS splitters and the other with splitters but without MELT.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Topology__c.Label: Topology
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Topology__c.HelpText:
Two topologies supported: 1 uplink (can be 1GE or 10GE or GPON) or redundant uplinks (in this case only redundant 1GE uplink is available).
 See drawing below. This selection impacts on the SFPs available in the Network Interfaces tab

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.TopologySX48.Label: Topology
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.TopologySX48.HelpText: Three topologies supported: 1 uplink (can be 1GE,10GE or GPON), redundant uplinks (in this case only 1GE uplinks are available) and subtending configuration. See drawing below. This selection impacts on the SFPs available in the Network Interfaces tab

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.TopologySX48.Label: Topology
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.TopologySX48.HelpText: Three topologies supported: 1 uplink (can be 1GE, 10GE or GPON), redundant uplinks (in this case only 1GE uplinks are available) and subtending configuration. See drawing below. This selection impacts on the SFPs available in the Network Interfaces tab

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Subscribers_.Label: Subscribers Copper Cable Length (to MDF)
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Subscribers_.HelpText: Copper based services (VDSL, Voice) require cables to connect the subscriber ports to the MDF. Different cable lengths are supported. If there are no customer indications, normally the proposed lengths are 15m for indoor and 3m for outdoor cabinets.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Powering__c.Label: Powering
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Powering__c.HelpText: 7367 SX-16F supports two types of powering: AC or RFT-V. If RFT-V selected, remote powering power cables are automatically included in the shopping cart

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.PoweringSX48.Label: Powering
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.PoweringSX48.HelpText: 7367 SX-48U supports three types of powering: AC, DC or RFT-V remote powering. Neither power cables nor MDF cables are provided with this product as it includes an integrated MDF.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.PoweringSX48.Label: Powering
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.PoweringSX48.HelpText: 7367 SX-16VP supports two types of powering: AC or RFT-V. Remote powering power cables are automatically included on the shopping cart if Deployable configuration is different than Outdoor IP65

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Pots_Splitte.Label: Pots Splitter Required?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Pots_Splitte.HelpText: Please indicate whether POTS splitters are needed in order to include them in the solution. This option is only available if powering = DC

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.NB_Line_Test.Label: NB Line Testing Required
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.NB_Line_Test.HelpText: In case that Voice is required, select this option to activate Narrowband Line testing

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Mounting_Kit.Label: Wall Mounting Kit
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Mounting_Kit.HelpText: Select this option if the mechanical kit to install the 7367 SX-16VP in a wall or similar surface is requested.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Interconnect.Label: Interconnection DSL-Voice
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Interconnect.HelpText: When both VDSL and Voice cards are equipped in the 7363 MX-6 , there are specific cables to interconnect both cards and simplify the number of longer cables towards the MDF.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Deployable_C.Label: Deployable Configuration
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Deployable_C.HelpText:
Three deployable configurations available: Indoor, Outdoor IP55 and Outdoor IP68.
 Indoor and Outdoor configurations require different MDF cables

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Deployable_C.Label: Deployable Configuration
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Deployable_C.HelpText:
Three deployable configurations available: Indoor, Outdoor IP55 and Outdoor IP65.
In case of Outdoor IP65 MDF & Alarm cables are not provided as this option includes an integrated MDF. Alarm cable is only provided in case of Indoor.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Alarm_Cable_.Label: Alarm Cable required
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Alarm_Cable_.HelpText: Alarm cable is optional. It will be dimensioned with the same length as the MDF cable selected in the last tab.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.current_inst.Label: Current installed licence base kEuros
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.current_inst.HelpText: Set the value in kEuros of the current installed license base

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Total_number.Label: Total number of ports in the network
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Total_number.HelpText: Please indicate the total number of ports (p2p ports equipped + number of ONTs) in the network to be managed by the AMS

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Syslog_Colle.Label: Syslog Collection: Billion Events/Day
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Syslog_Colle.HelpText:
For a greenfield select between 1 to 1000  Billion Events per Day.
For an expansion select between 0 to 1000  Billion Events per Day.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Quantity_of_.Label: Quantity of  Fastermind EventLink SW
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Quantity_of_.HelpText: Nomina use quantity of  Fastermind EventLink SW

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_ve.Label: Number of vendor specific interface type
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_ve.HelpText:
For a greenfield select between 1 to 1000  vendor specific interface types.
For an expansion select between 0 to 1000  vendor specific interface types.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_op.Label: Number of operator positions
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_op.HelpText: Please introduce the number of operator positions for the AMS

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_ne.Label: Number of new ports in the network
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_ne.HelpText: Indicate the number of new ports (p2p ports equipped + number of ONTs) that will be introduced in the network as Extension.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_Tr.Label: Number of Training days?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Number_of_Tr.HelpText: How many training days are you including?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Nominal_quan.Label: IRP value of legacy Eventlink licences
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Nominal_quan.HelpText: in kEUR (also usable for other DI licences than Eventlink)

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.New_operator.Label: New operator positions
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.New_operator.HelpText: Indicate the number (if any) of New operator positions to extend the current AMS deployment

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.New_AMS_Suit.Label: New AMS Suite
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.New_AMS_Suit.HelpText:
"AMS supports two configuration options:
- Starter system: intended for small networks (less than 3000 ports), and including some predefined licenses as a bundle
- AMS a la Carte: Generic case where all the AMS options can be selected one by one "

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Million_Even.Label: Million Events per Day
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Million_Even.HelpText: Configuration can be done for between 1 and 30.000 mio input events per day

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Mediation_Mi.Label: Mediation: Million Events per Day
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Mediation_Mi.HelpText: Configuration can be done for between 1 and 30.000 mio input events per day

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Licenses_nee.Label: Licenses needed for release upgrade?
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Licenses_nee.HelpText: How many Licenses are needed for release upgrade?

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Licencing_No.Label: IRP value of Fastermind legacy licences
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Licencing_No.HelpText: in kEUR (also usable for other DI licences)

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Interface_Am.Label: Number of vendor specific interface type

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Extension_Ty.Label: Extension Type
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Extension_Ty.HelpText: Select this option if the Size of the network is going to be extended with new ports or new nodes

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_num.Label: Existing  number of ports in the network
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_num.HelpText: Please introduce the total number of ports existing in the network.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_Sof.Label: Existing Software Subscription Plan(SSP)
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_Sof.HelpText: Select this option if there is a current Software Suscription Plan in place with this customer.

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_AMS.Label: Existing AMS Suite
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_AMS.HelpText:
AMS supports two configuration options:
- Starter system: intended for small networks (less than 3000 ports), and including some predefined licenses as a bundle
- AMS a la Carte: Generic case where all the AMS options can be selected one by one

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_552.Label: Existing 5529 SDC
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_552.HelpText: Select this option if there is an existing 5529 SDC application installed in the customer Network Management System

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_552.Label: Existing 5529 OAD
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_552.HelpText: Select this option if there is an existing 5529 OAD application installed in the customer Network Management System

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_552.Label: Existing 5529 IDM
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_552.HelpText: Select this option if there is an existing 5529 IDM application installed in the customer Network Management System

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_552.Label: Existing 5529 APC
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Existing_552.HelpText: Select this option if there is an existing 5529 APC application installed in the customer Network Management System

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Amount_of_sm.Label: Amount of small Features
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Amount_of_sm.HelpText: Such as Trigger Component and Profile Component (value 0,1 or 2)

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Amount_of_la.Label: Amount of large Features
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.Amount_of_la.HelpText: Such as GeoMaps add-on, Operations intelligence (as standalone) and Big Data Search as standalone solution) (Value: 0, 1, 2 or 3)​

ProductAttributeValueId1__r.AMS_Type__c.Label: AMS Type
ProductAttributeValueId1__r.AMS_Type__c.HelpText:
AMS Configuration
This Configuration allows to dimension three different types of scenarios:
- A complete new AMS to be introduced (normally for a greenfield)
- An extension from an existing network and AMS
- A simple SW upgrade

How_many_MPM_interfaces_are_used_for_GPO.Label: Number of MPM interfaces used for GPON

PicklistEntries.value: 1 x OPEN ENDED AC PWR CBL, 250V, 3M, EUR

Topology__c.Label: Topology
Topology__c.HelpText: Two toplogies supported: 1 uplink (can be 1GE or 10GE or GPON) or redundant uplinks (in this case only redundant 1GE uplink is available). See drawing below. This selection impacts on the SFP availables in the  Network Interfaces tab.

Powering_ISAM_MX__c.Label: Powering
Powering_ISAM_MX__c.HelpText: 7363 MX-6 supports both DC and AC power supply. In case of AC powering, a 2-slot wide NTIO card is required to provide the AC plug interface, reducing  the number of Line card slots from 6 to 5. In case of AC powering, G.fast and VDSL 35b is not supported

NTIO_Required__c.Label: NTIO Required
NTIO_Required__c.HelpText:
NTIO card is mandatory if:-AC power supply required-Voice subscribers required-More than 3 VDSL cards equipped-More than 3 G.fast cards equipped
If none of these conditions is required,select the NTIO card to extend with more uplinks or downlinks

Interconnection_DSL_Voice__c.Label: Interconnection DSL Voice
Interconnection_DSL_Voice__c.HelpText: When both VDSL and Voice cards are equipped in the 7363 MX-6 , there are specific cables to interconnect both cards and simplify the number of longer cables towards the MDF.

Q_SROS_Hybrid__c.Label: SROS Hybrid OpenFlow Switch ?
Q_SROS_Hybrid__c.HelpText: Allows configuration of Hybrid OpenFlow switch functionality for traffic steering subject to limitations imposed by the particular SR OS release deployed and the capabilities of the deployed hardware in the system

Q_SROS_GMPLS__c.Label: SROS GMPLS-UNI functionality required ?
Q_SROS_GMPLS__c.HelpText: Allows the use of the GMPLS-UNI functionality.  Prerequisites:   When used with a 7950 XRS system no LSR Level C-XMAs or XMAs can be present in the system unless they have the associated "LIC UP - LSR to IPCore" license”

Q_SROS_ADV__c.Label: DC GW and Service Chaining  required ?
Q_SROS_ADV__c.HelpText: Allows the use of advanced DC GW and service chaining and steering functions, subject to platform feature limitations and support, such as:  Fully Dynamic VSD Integration for Nuage driven service creation, use of a BGP EVPN control plane for L2/L3 service

Q_Full_VPRN__c.Label: Full VPRN - More than 8 instances ?

Q_ESM__c.Label: ESM functionality required ?
Q_ESM__c.HelpText: This base ESM license is required for using the ESM features on 7x50 platforms for IPoE, PPPoE, PPPOA, and L2TP subscribers. Use of embedded DHCPv4 and DHCPv6 server functionality on 7x50 is also included in this license.

Apttus_Config2__IsTransient__c.HelpText: Indicates a transient record created by the application with default values. A new product attribute value is in transient state until the record is explicitly saved by the user.

Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractUnitPrice.Label: Current Contract Unit Price
Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractUnitPrice.HelpText: The value of the current contract unit price for the product or service determined for the current contract term during a new sale or a renewal. Mid term changes do not result in a change to this value.

Apttus_Config2__TotalQuantity__c.HelpText: The total quantity of product across various instances or purchase identifiers

Apttus_Config2__PurchaseId__c.Label: Purchase Identifier
Apttus_Config2__PurchaseId__c.HelpText: The purchase identifier associated with the asset

Apttus_Config2__LegalEntityId__c.Label: Legal Entity
Apttus_Config2__LegalEntityId__c.HelpText: ID of the legal entity associated with the asset. This will be used for downstream billing and revenue functions.

Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractValue__c.Label: Current Contract Value
Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractValue__c.HelpText: The value of the current contract period as determinedfor the current contract term during a new sale or a renewal. Mid term changes do not result in a change to this value.

Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractTerm__c.Label: Current Contract Term
Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractTerm__c.HelpText: The term of the current contract period as determined during a new sale or a renewal. Mid term changes do not result in a change to this value.

Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractStartDate.Label: Current Contract Start Date
Apttus_Config2__CurrentContractStartDate.HelpText: The start date of the current contract term as determined during a new sale or a renewal. Mid term changes do not result in a change to this value.

Apttus_CMConfig__AgreementLineItemId__c.Label: Agreement Line Item
Apttus_CMConfig__AgreementLineItemId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated agreement line item

Apttus_Config2__SellingUom__c.Label: Selling Uom
Apttus_Config2__SellingUom__c.HelpText: The selling unit of measure for the product

Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryService__c.Label: Is Primary Service
Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryService__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the service is primary or not.

Apttus_Config2__BillingDayOfMonth__c.Label: Billing Day Of Month
Apttus_Config2__BillingDayOfMonth__c.HelpText: The billing day of month. Specific Day of Month, End of Month, etc

Apttus_Config2__TotalBalance__c.Label: Total Balance
Apttus_Config2__TotalBalance__c.HelpText: The amount added to the asset till date

Apttus_Config2__AvailableBalance__c.Label: Available Balance
Apttus_Config2__AvailableBalance__c.HelpText: The balance currently available for consumption post additions and deductions

Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalLineItemId__c.Label: Quote Line Item
Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalLineItemId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated quote/proposal line item

Apttus_Config2__Term__c.Label: Pricing Term
Apttus_Config2__Term__c.HelpText: The pricing term associated with the product or service

Apttus_Config2__Taxable__c.Label: Taxable ?
Apttus_Config2__Taxable__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line item is taxable

Apttus_Config2__TaxInclusive__c.Label: Tax Inclusive ?
Apttus_Config2__TaxInclusive__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the price is tax inclusive. Only applicable for taxable items.

Apttus_Config2__TaxCodeId__c.Label: Tax Code
Apttus_Config2__TaxCodeId__c.HelpText: ID of the tax code associated with the line item. Only applicable for taxable items.

Apttus_Config2__PrimaryLineNumber__c.Label: Primary Line Number
Apttus_Config2__PrimaryLineNumber__c.HelpText: Represents the unique number for each primary line item

Apttus_Config2__PriceUom__c.Label: Pricing Uom
Apttus_Config2__PriceUom__c.HelpText: The pricing unit of measure for the product

Apttus_Config2__PaymentTermId__c.Label: Payment Term
Apttus_Config2__PaymentTermId__c.HelpText: ID of the payment term associated with the line item

Apttus_Config2__ParentBundleNumber__c.Label: Parent Bundle Number
Apttus_Config2__ParentBundleNumber__c.HelpText: Represents the parent bundle number associated with the child bundle

Apttus_Config2__ParentAssetId__c.Label: Parent Asset Line Item
Apttus_Config2__ParentAssetId__c.HelpText: The ID of the direct parent asset.

Apttus_Config2__OriginalStartDate__c.Label: Original Start Date
Apttus_Config2__OriginalStartDate__c.HelpText: The original start date associated with the asset

Apttus_Config2__NextRenewEndDate__c.Label: Next Renew End Date
Apttus_Config2__NextRenewEndDate__c.HelpText: The next renew end date for the asset line item

Apttus_Config2__NetUnitPrice__c.Label: Net Unit Price
Apttus_Config2__NetUnitPrice__c.HelpText: The net unit price for the product or service is the Unit Adjusted Price after applying the Group Adjustment %

Apttus_Config2__MustUpgrade__c.Label: Must Upgrade
Apttus_Config2__MustUpgrade__c.HelpText: Whether the product requires upgrade during renewal.

Apttus_Config2__MinUsageQuantity__c.Label: Min Usage Quantity
Apttus_Config2__MinUsageQuantity__c.HelpText: The minimum usage quantity. Only applicable to usage items.

Apttus_Config2__MaxUsageQuantity__c.Label: Max Usage Quantity
Apttus_Config2__MaxUsageQuantity__c.HelpText: The maximum usage quantity. Only applicable to usage items.

Apttus_Config2__LocationId__c.Label: Location
Apttus_Config2__LocationId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated account location

Apttus_Config2__LastRenewEndDate__c.Label: Last Renew End Date
Apttus_Config2__LastRenewEndDate__c.HelpText: The last renew end date for the asset line item

Apttus_Config2__IsUsageTierModifiable__c.Label: Is Usage Tier Modifiable
Apttus_Config2__IsUsageTierModifiable__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the usage price tier is modifiable for the product or option

Apttus_Config2__IsRenewed__c.Label: Is Renewed
Apttus_Config2__IsRenewed__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the asset line item is renewed

Apttus_Config2__IsRenewalPending__c.Label: Is Renewal Pending
Apttus_Config2__IsRenewalPending__c.HelpText: Indicates whether renewal is pending for the asset line item

Apttus_Config2__IsReadOnly__c.Label: Is Read Only
Apttus_Config2__IsReadOnly__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the asset line item is modifiable

Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryRampLine__c.Label: Is Primary Ramp Line
Apttus_Config2__IsPrimaryRampLine__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the line is the primary line for the price ramp. Only applicable when price ramp is in effect for the product or option

Apttus_Config2__IsInactive__c.Label: Inactive
Apttus_Config2__IsInactive__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the asset is inactive.

Apttus_Config2__InitialActivationDate__c.Label: Initial Activation Date
Apttus_Config2__InitialActivationDate__c.HelpText: The initial activation date from the ready for activation on the first creation order.

Apttus_Config2__HideInvoiceDisplay__c.Label: Hide Invoice Display
Apttus_Config2__HideInvoiceDisplay__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the item would be hidden in the invoice display.

Apttus_Config2__DeltaQuantity__c.Label: Delta Quantity
Apttus_Config2__DeltaQuantity__c.HelpText: The change in quantity for the asset due to the latest order. It is positive for increments, negative for decrements and zero when there is no change.

Apttus_Config2__DeltaPrice__c.Label: Delta Price
Apttus_Config2__DeltaPrice__c.HelpText: The change to the net price of the asset due to the latest order. It is positive for increments, negative for decrements and zero when there is no change.

Apttus_Config2__ChargeGroupId__c.Label: Charge Group
Apttus_Config2__ChargeGroupId__c.HelpText: ID of the charge group to which this charge type is associated

Apttus_Config2__CancelledDate__c.Label: Cancelled Date
Apttus_Config2__CancelledDate__c.HelpText: The date when the asset line item was cancelled

Apttus_Config2__BusinessLineItemId__c.Label: Business Line Item
Apttus_Config2__BusinessLineItemId__c.HelpText: Line Item Id  of the business object like agreement line item or proposal line item.

Apttus_Config2__BundleAssetId__c.Label: Bundle Asset Line Item
Apttus_Config2__BundleAssetId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated bundle line item.

Apttus_Config2__BillingStartDate__c.Label: Billing Start Date
Apttus_Config2__BillingStartDate__c.HelpText: The billing start date. Also known as the first billing period end date.

Apttus_Config2__BillingRule__c.Label: Billing Rule
Apttus_Config2__BillingRule__c.HelpText: The billing rule associated with the price item

Apttus_Config2__BillingPreferenceId__c.Label: Billing Preference
Apttus_Config2__BillingPreferenceId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated billing preference

Apttus_Config2__BillingPlanId__c.Label: Billing Plan
Apttus_Config2__BillingPlanId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated billing plan

Apttus_Config2__BillingFrequency__c.Label: Billing Frequency
Apttus_Config2__BillingFrequency__c.HelpText: The billing frequency associated with the recurring or usage price

Apttus_Config2__BillingEndDate__c.Label: Billing End Date
Apttus_Config2__BillingEndDate__c.HelpText: The billing end date. Also known as the last billing period end date.

Apttus_Config2__BillThroughDate__c.Label: Bill Through Date
Apttus_Config2__BillThroughDate__c.HelpText: The last billing period date through which invoice has been generated

Apttus_Config2__AutoRenew__c.Label: Auto Renew
Apttus_Config2__AutoRenew__c.HelpText: Indicates whether the asset is set to auto renew

Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__c.Label: Attribute Value
Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__c.HelpText: ID of the associated product attribute value

Apttus_Config2__AssetTCV__c.Label: Asset TCV
Apttus_Config2__AssetTCV__c.HelpText: The total contract value of the asset over its lifetime

Apttus_Config2__AssetMRR__c.Label: Asset MRR
Apttus_Config2__AssetMRR__c.HelpText: The average monthly recurring revenue from the asset over its lifetime

Apttus_Config2__AssetARR__c.Label: Asset ARR
Apttus_Config2__AssetARR__c.HelpText: The average annual recurring revenue from the asset over its lifetime.
